Checks if the calling actor hit the floor. If so, and the floor is a liquid, it simply removes it..."
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_SerpentHeadCheck'''
(''no parameter'')
Checks if the calling actor hit the floor. If so, and the floor is a liquid, it simply removes itself. Otherwise it jumps to the Death state. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|SerpentHead}} and derived classes.
